name: Donald Mancini
description: i am a simple man that believes in family and will do anything for those that I love , I will love to meet a woman that believes in true love and willing to build a home with a man that will stand by her side all the days of her life , she will be loved and pampered all the time , I sure need a woman i can cook with and be happy with , i have been widowed for a while now and hate being alone , I will do anything so I wont be alone on that BIG bed today again , I am willing to sacrifice anything for that special woman that wants to have a happy home forever
